attributes.additional_details: With a lot of talk of the ambulance service being run to its limits and beyond I feel that if people did not have to have the c1 licence they would be more willing to retrain. I know personally that you have to have this licence to drive an ambulance I for one would not be able to afford to do the c1 licence I know of a lot of people that want to join the ambulance service but can't afford to do it in this pandemic do you not think the ambulance service could do with the help. Help us to retrain
attributes.background: Help us to help the ambulance service and drop the c1 licence so people can have a better chance to join the ambulance service.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular we're not sure if you want the license categories that cover ambulances to be changed to allow anyone with driving license to drive larger vehicles, or if you would like retraining to be funded.
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
